name: MECHYBARA CAPYBOT 20XX
description:
Take control of your high-powered battle mech to mow down hordes of robot enemies- but watch out! Your mech only has so much energy, and you'll need to leave its safety to salvage batteries to keep it powered! How long can you survive against the mob of enemies before getting taken out?

Developed in under 48 hours for the 2022 Global Game Jam

GAME DESIGN/PROGRAMMING:

Joseph Horak

Nathaniel Hebert

Connor Blankenship

Ethan Godwin

CHARACTER/UI ART:

Miranda West

ENVIRONMENT/SPLASH ART:

Kelly Shen

MUSIC:

Jasper Murphy
